Volunteers to handle police enquiry counters in libraries.
Skegness Library to have 5 hours per week longer opening hours.
Libraries to be renamed "hubs" and take on public health role e.g. preschool and anti-smoking.
Merthyr Tydfil – Libraries formally handed over to Merthry Tydfil Leisure Trust.
Dinas Powys, Sully, Rhoose, Wenvoe and St Athan to be volunteer run.
Considering passing service to trust, merging with Devon, passing to volunteers.  Consultation.
Libraries formally handed over to Hull Culture and Leisure Trust (HCAL).  Weddings to take place in Central Library.
Pop-up library in Belle Vale Shopping Centre. Little Libraries to be set up throughout city.
Tyburn Library transferred to Castle Vale Tenants and Residents Alliance (CVTRA) (1 paid member of staff, others are volunteers)
Conwy – Will continue with NE Wales School Libraries Service until closure: will be supplied until March 2016.
Wrexham – Withdrew from NE Wales School Libraries Service, effective end of March 2015.
Denbighshire – ceased funding of NE Wales School Libraries Service (to end July 2015) after withdrawal of Wrexham.
Hexham Library may move/be smaller to be co-located with other council services.
ceased funding of NE Wales School Libraries Service (to end July 2015) after withdrawal of Wrexham.

Enfield  - 13 out of 17 under threat: Mobile library service may end.  Four libraries safe (Enfield Town, Palmers Green, Edmonton Green and Ordnance Road, in Enfield Lock) but up to 12 others may be passed to volunteers or closed.
Strelley Road Library now closed: will be demolished and become part of co-located service from 2017.

Trafford - Bowfell will close 27 April, Davyhulme will close 3 May, Woodsend fewer staff but Open+ may maintain hours, Lostock will transfer to college (school library with public access), Coppice will be transferred to BlueSCI mental health and wellbeing group, Timperley will reduce in size and be part of GP surgery, Hale will be sold to private developer who will need to maintain library for two years.
15 voluntary redundancies mean compulsory redundancies not required.
Plans for Woodseats Library to be closed, with the land being redeveloped into joint library/medical centre/pharmacy.
